title: The Best of the West: An Anthology of Classic Writing From the American West
description: "Anyone who enjoys a slumgullion stew can find something tasty in this campfire collection."  —  Entertainment Weekly A sterling collection of classic and contemporary fiction and nonfiction evoking the unique spirit of the West and its people, selected and introduced by one of today's premier chroniclers of the Western landscape and a New York Times bestselling author.
author: Tony Hillerman
